studyAmendmentImpacts.description: Updated protocol to reflect most recent guidance for treating study participants with nivolumab and added exploratory objective.
Addressed minor inconsistencies in study objectives and endpoints.
Changed primary endpoint structure by removing ORR as a co-primary objective.
Shifted co-primary endpoint from Time to Progression (TTP) to Objective Response Rate (ORR).

studyAmendmentReasons.reasonText: Reflect the most recent guidance for treating study participants with nivolumab
Exploratory objective evaluating correlation of tumor inflammation with efficacy based on recent preliminary data
Change Overall Response Rate (ORR) from a co-primary objective to a secondary objective
Update the overall alpha in Section 8.4.2.1

studyChanges.beforeText: Overall Response Rate (ORR) as a co-primary objective
studyChanges.afterText: Overall Survival (OS) will be the sole Primary Endpoint
studyChanges.summary: ORR moved from co-primary to secondary objective.
Co-primary endpoint and objective changed from TTP to ORR.

studyChanges.afterText: Requirement for confirmatory scan to be performed for CR/PR assessment of best overall response (BOR)
Collection of peripheral blood mononuclear cells (PBMCs) and myeloid derived suppressor cells (MDSCs)
studyChanges.summary: Added collection of PBMCs and MDSCs at baseline from selected sites.

studyChanges.afterText: Reduction of frequency of HCV RNA testing for HCV infected subjects
studyChanges.summary: Reduced frequency of HCV RNA testing.
